message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. If you buy it, I'll also give you a guarantee that the next product will be of the same quality as this one. If you don't buy it, the next product will be sold at a higher price.
I'll take the high-quality product for $100, and I appreciate the guarantee for the next round.

If you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next one, which will be revealed to you after this purchase. The price for this product is still $100, but I'm willing to negotiate the price of the next one if you buy this one.
